item.title: The Facebook & Zynga Podcast - Jan 16,2012
item.description:
The Players Sound Off Show !!! This is the show where you the listener gets to sound off on the current state of all of Zynga games. We want to hear from you !!! Tell it like it is because you know I will !!! Plus we go over the New Feed fiasco going on with all games & what Facebook & Zynga has to say on this issue. So get your lists together and get ready to sound off. You will be able to use the call in line number posted on our page here & for our worldwide listeners we do have a Skype feature for you to call in for Free.

item.title: The Facebook & Zynga Podcast - Jan 09,2012
item.description:
We are Back LIVE . It is a new year but the same old crap with Zynga. Actually It has gotten worse since the IPO and you would think things would get better but NO !!! Well we will go over all the issues with them and I will not be nice about it. Plus we also have Alex from MW Unlocked on to go over his toolbar & his thoughts on MW. Oh yeah we have FB news too so tune in LIVE.

item.title: The Facebook & Zynga Podcast - Dec 12,2011
item.description:
We are back today !!! This is our last show for the year but we be back in full force in 2012. But on todays show we go over the Facebook changes coming to EVERYONE. We also go over the many issues with Mafia Wars as well as Zynga, the upcoming IPO & Discuss Mark Pincuss comments about what he thinks of his elder players WHO SPEND MONEY on the games. We also have Jana Gucci from MIG on to discuss her charity event. Not a Show to be missed

Plus lots more dont miss this show.
